languages.text: {n}Согбенная фигура в запыленной робе отводит край капюшона. На вас взирает истощенное женское лицо: обтянутый кожей череп с болезненно выступающими аугментациями, несколько язв на щеке и лихорадочно блестящие глаза.{/n} "Хмм... визуальное описание соответствует дознавателю ван Калоксу..." {n}Савант несколько раз моргает и дергает головой.{/n} "Вы все же смогли добраться".

{n}The stooped figure draws back the hood of the grimy robe, revealing the emaciated face of a woman. Her skin is stretched taut over her skull and sickeningly protruding augmentations, and her cheek is marred with several open wounds. She looks at you with a feverish gleam in her eyes.{/n} "Hmm... The visual description matches Interrogator van Calox..." {n}The Sage blinks several times and her head twitches.{/n} "You made it here after all."
languages.original_text: {n}Согбенная фигура в запыленной робе отводит край капюшона. На вас взирает истощенное женское лицо: обтянутый кожей череп с болезненно выступающими аугментациями, несколько язв на щеке и лихорадочно блестящие глаза.{/n} "Хмм... визуальное описание соответствует дознавателю ван Калоксу..." {n}Савант несколько раз моргает и дергает головой.{/n} "Вы все же смогли добраться".

languages.text: {n}眼前佝偻的身影拉下了脏污长袍的兜帽，露出了女人憔悴的面孔。她的皮肤绷得紧紧的，皮下埋着突起的植入物，让人感觉相当不快，脸上还挂着几道伤口。她看着你，眼神中闪烁着狂热的光芒。{/n}“嗯……视觉描述信息，与冯·卡洛克斯审讯官相符……”{n}这位贤者眨了眨眼睛，脑袋抽搐了一下。{/n}“你终于还是来了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The stooped figure draws back the hood of the grimy robe, revealing the emaciated face of a woman. Her skin is stretched taut over her skull and sickeningly protruding augmentations, and her cheek is marred with several open wounds. She looks at you with a feverish gleam in her eyes.{/n} "Hmm... The visual description matches Interrogator van Calox..." {n}The Sage blinks several times and her head twitches.{/n} "You made it here after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前佝偻的身影拉下了脏污长袍的兜帽，露出了女人憔悴的面孔。她的皮肤绷得紧紧的，皮下埋着突起的植入物，让人感觉相当不快，脸上还挂着几道伤口。她看着你，眼神中闪烁着狂热的光芒。{/n}“嗯……视觉描述信息，与冯·卡洛克斯审讯官相符……”{n}这位贤者眨了眨眼睛，脑袋抽搐了一下。{/n}“你终于还是来了。”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}La figura encorvada se retira la capucha de la sucia túnica para revelar el rostro demacrado de una mujer. Su piel está tirante sobre su cráneo y sus aumentos, que sobresalen de forma repulsiva, y presenta heridas abiertas en la mejilla. Te mira con un brillo febril en los ojos.{/n} «Mmm... La descripción visual coincide con la del interrogador van Calox...». {n}La sabia parpadea varias veces y su cabeza sufre una contracción nerviosa.{/n} «Ha venido, después de todo».

The visual description matches Interrogator van Calox..." {n}The Sage blinks several times and her head twitches.{/n} "You made it here after all."

La descripción visual coincide con la del interrogador van Calox...». {n}La sabia parpadea varias veces y su cabeza sufre una contracción nerviosa.{/n} «Ha venido, después de todo».

languages.text: {n}猫背の人物が汚れたローブのフードを外すと、やつれた女の顔を露わになった。彼女の皮膚は頭蓋骨と病的なほどに突き出たオーグメント上でぴんと張り、頬にはいくつか生傷が残っている。彼女は熱狂的な光をたたえる目であなたを見つめている。{/n}「ふーむ…視覚的な説明はインテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックスと一致します…」{n}賢者は数回瞬きし、頭をかくかくと動かした。{/n}「お前はついに、ここまで来た」
languages.original_text: {n}The stooped figure draws back the hood of the grimy robe, revealing the emaciated face of a woman. Her skin is stretched taut over her skull and sickeningly protruding augmentations, and her cheek is marred with several open wounds. She looks at you with a feverish gleam in her eyes.{/n} "Hmm... The visual description matches Interrogator van Calox..." {n}The Sage blinks several times and her head twitches.{/n} "You made it here after all."

traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}La silhouette voûtée retire la capuche de sa robe crasseuse, révélant le visage émacié d'une femme. Sa peau est tendue sur son crâne et ses augmentations horriblement saillantes, et plusieurs plaies ouvertes entaillent sa joue. Elle vous regarde avec une lueur fiévreuse dans ses yeux.{/n} « Hmm... La description visuelle correspond à l'interrogateur van Calox... » {n}La sage cligne plusieurs fois des yeux et sa tête tressaille.{/n} « Vous avez fini par venir, alors. »
languages.original_text: {n}The stooped figure draws back the hood of the grimy robe, revealing the emaciated face of a woman. Her skin is stretched taut over her skull and sickeningly protruding augmentations, and her cheek is marred with several open wounds. She looks at you with a feverish gleam in her eyes.{/n} "Hmm... The visual description matches Interrogator van Calox..." {n}The Sage blinks several times and her head twitches.{/n} "You made it here after all."

La description visuelle correspond à l'interrogateur van Calox... » {n}La sage cligne plusieurs fois des yeux et sa tête tressaille.{/n} « Vous avez fini par venir, alors. »

languages.text: {n}Die gebeugte Gestalt zieht die Kapuze ihrer schmutzigen Robe zurück und enthüllt das ausgemergelte Gesicht einer Frau. Ihre Haut ist eng über ihren Schädel und abstoßend herausragende Augmentationen gezogen, und auf ihren Wangen klaffen mehrere offene Wunden. Sie blickt dich mit einem fiebrigen Leuchten in den Augen an.{/n} "Hmm ... die visuelle Beschreibung passt zu Interrogator van Calox ..." {n}Die Weise blinzelt mehrmals, und ihr Kopf zuckt.{/n} "Ihr habt es doch noch hierher geschafft."

languages.text: {n}Kambur figür, kirli cübbesinin kapüşonunu geriye atıyor ve ortaya bir deri bir kemik kalmış bir kadının yüzü çıkıyor. Teni, kafatasına ve hastalıklı çıkıntılara sebep olan ogmentlerinin üzerine iyice gerilmiş, yanağı da birden fazla açık yarayla dejenere olmuş. Sana bakarken gözleri hummalı bir şekilde parıldıyor.{/n} "Hımm... Görsel tanımlama, Sorgucu van Calox'la uyuşuyor." {n}Başı seğiren Âlim, birkaç kez gözlerini kırpıyor.{/n} "Gelebildin demek."
languages.original_text: {n}The stooped figure draws back the hood of the grimy robe, revealing the emaciated face of a woman. Her skin is stretched taut over her skull and sickeningly protruding augmentations, and her cheek is marred with several open wounds. She looks at you with a feverish gleam in her eyes.{/n} "Hmm... The visual description matches Interrogator van Calox..." {n}The Sage blinks several times and her head twitches.{/n} "You made it here after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kambur figür, kirli cübbesinin kapüşonunu geriye atıyor, ortaya bir deri bir kemik kalmış bir kadının yüzü çıkıyor. Teni, kafatasına ve hastalıklı çıkıntılar yapan ogmentlerinin üzerine iyice gerilmiş ve yanağı birden fazla açık yarayla dejenere olmuş. Size bakarken gözleri hummalı bir şekilde parıldıyor.{/n} "Hımm. Görsel tanımlama Sorgucu van Calox'la uyuşuyor." {n}Âlim birkaç kez gözlerini kırpıyor ve başı seğiriyor.{/n} "Gelmeyi başardın demek."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
